short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the average grade and other statistics from grades found on StudentWeb and Vitnemålsportalen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Grade Calculator is a user-friendly extension designed to help students calculate their average grades directly from the StudentWeb (fsweb.no) and Vitnemålsportalen (app.vitnemalsportalen.no) platforms. This extension provides a streamlined and efficient way for students to manage their academic performance, enabling them to make informed decisions about their studies.

Key Features:
- Automated Grade Extraction: Automatically extract grades, credits, and course information directly from the StudentWeb or Vitnemålsportalen platforms without manual input.
- Real-time Calculations: Instantly calculate your average grade and total credits with real-time data processing, ensuring up-to-date results.
- Detailed Grade Insights: View detailed grade distributions, cumulative averages, and total credits per semester, all within a single, easy-to-navigate interface.
- Dark Mode Support: Seamlessly switch between light and dark modes to suit your viewing preferences and reduce eye strain.
- Secure and Private: All data processing occurs locally on your device. Your grade data is never transmitted or stored externally, ensuring complete privacy and security.

How It Works:

1. Install the Extension
2. Navigate to the results: Open your StudentWeb or Vitnemålsportalen account at fsweb.no or https://app.vitnemalsportalen.no/ respectively  and navigate to the results page.
3. Calculate Grades: Click on the extension icon and select "Calculate Grades" to automatically extract and display your grades.
4. Explore Your Data: Use the dropdown menu and sorting options to explore your grade data through various charts and summaries.
